title: Twice-baked courgette and goat's cheese puffs
ingredients: ['25g (1oz) unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 courgettes, roughly chopped', '35g (1¼ oz) plain flour', '300ml (½ pint) semi-skimmed milk, warmed', "200g (7oz) fresh goat's cheese, crumbled", '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', '3 eggs, separated', 'Black pepper', '6 tablespoons half-fat crème fraîche', '6 thin slices of dry-cure ham']
